name: ATO Client Management

subpages.title: This is a prototype
subpages.markdown:
While every effort has been made to ensure the information provided here is correct, it is a prototype developed so we can get your feedback on a new way of documenting our services.

You should reffer to [the original documentation](http://www.sbr.gov.au/software-developers/developer-tools/ato/client-management-cm2) for if you are considering implementing this service.

## Telling us what you think
We would love to hear what you think about both the new style of documentation, and the service catalogue platform.

At the bottom of every page there are buttons to give us quick feedback.

If you would like to give us more detailed feedback, please [raise a github issue](https://github.com/dxa/service-catalogue/issues/new)

subpages.title: Getting started
subpages.markdown: The ATO Client Management service lets a business, or their intermediary, to manage their information with the ATO.

subpages.title: Standard Business Reporting
subpages.markdown:
Standard Business Reporting is a joint initiative between serveral federal and state government agenceis to simplify and standardise the way they offer their machine-to-machine services.

> More information about what SBR is and the major components

subpages.title: Representing data - XBRL
subpages.markdown:
eXtensible Business Reporting Language is the technology used by Standard Business Reporting to represent the data that is exchanged between parties.

> More information about what XBRL is, how it works, and implementation options

subpages.title: Sending messages - ebMS3
subpages.markdown:
The Australian Taxation Office use a messaging technology called [ebMS3](http://docs.oasis-open.org/ebxml-msg/ebms/v3.0/core/cs02/ebms_core-3.0-spec-cs-02.html), part of the [Electronic Business using eXtensible Markup Language](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/EbXML) OASIS standard.

> More information about what ebMS3 is, how it works, and implementation options

subpages.title: Related articles
subpages.markdown:
We've developed some other material to help you make sure your product works well with our systems.

- [ATO Taxpayer Declarations](/faq/ato_sbr_declarations)
- [Matching client information to ATO records](/faq/matching_ato_records)

subpages.title: Registering for access
subpages.markdown:
The ATO has implemented a compliance framework for Digital Service Providers, called the Operational Framework. The framework ensures the safety and integrity of the taxation and superannuation systems for all Australians.

An important step in registering for access is demonstrating how your products, and your business, meet the framework.

Read about the [ATO Operational Framework](https://softwaredevelopers.ato.gov.au/operational_framework) here

subpages.title: Taxpayer declarations
subpages.markdown:
If you are lodging on behalf of a taxpayer, the law requires you to obtain a declaration from them first.

Read our article on [ATO Taxpayer Declarations](/faq/ato_sbr_declarations) to find out more.

subpages.title: Matching client information to ATO records
subpages.markdown:
We match taxpayers using their details like surname and date of birth.

Read our article on [matching client information to ATO records](/faq/matching_ato_records) to find out which records you shouldn't let users modify.

subpages.title: Security
subpages.markdown:
> Information on AUSKey, including cut off dates + sdks
> Information on AUSID + sdks

subpages.title: Account Role
subpages.markdown:
This service allows users to view and maintain their details for activity statement registrations.

More [detailed documentation on this service](http://www.sbr.gov.au/software-developers/developer-tools/ato/client-management-cm2#AccountRole) is available, if you can't find what you're looking for here.

subpages.title: List
subpages.markdown:
Get the list of existing account roles

## Your request to us
```xml
<acc:ACCROLEList xmlns:acc="http://www.sbr.gov.au/ato/accrolelist">
  <acc:INT>
      <acc:ContextIdentifiersTaxAgentNumberIdentifier>01234567</acc:ContextIdentifiersTaxAgentNumberIdentifier>
      <acc:ContextIdentifiersAustralianBusinessNumberIdentifier>01234567890</acc:ContextIdentifiersAustralianBusinessNumberIdentifier>
      <acc:IdentifiersTaxAgentNumberIdentifier>0123456</acc:IdentifiersTaxAgentNumberIdentifier>
  </acc:INT>
  <acc:RP>
      <acc:ContextIdentifiersTaxFileNumberIdentifier>012345678</acc:ContextIdentifiersTaxFileNumberIdentifier>
      <acc:ContextIdentifiersAustralianBusinessNumberIdentifier>01234567890</acc:ContextIdentifiersAustralianBusinessNumberIdentifier>
      <acc:ContextIdentifiersWithholdingPayerNumberIdentifier>012345678</acc:ContextIdentifiersWithholdingPayerNumberIdentifier>
      <acc:ContextIdentifiersAustralianTaxationOfficeReferenceNumberIdentifier>012345678901</acc:ContextIdentifiersAustralianTaxationOfficeReferenceNumberIdentifier>
      <acc:ReportForecastDate>2008-09-29</acc:ReportForecastDate>
      <acc:TaxAccountIdentifier>012345678901</acc:TaxAccountIdentifier>
      <acc:TaxAccountSequenceNumber>200</acc:TaxAccountSequenceNumber>
      <acc:TaxRoleTypeCodeCollection>
      <!--0 to 10 repetitions:-->
      <acc:TaxRoleTypeCode>SGREM</acc:TaxRoleTypeCode>
    </acc:TaxRoleTypeCodeCollection>
    <acc:Pagination>
      <acc:InteractionRecordLimitCount>200</acc:InteractionRecordLimitCount>
      <acc:InteractionRecordListIndexNumber>200</acc:InteractionRecordListIndexNumber>
    </acc:Pagination>
  </acc:RP>
</acc:ACCROLEList>
```
## Our response
```xml
<acc:ACCROLEListResponse xmlns:acc="http://www.sbr.gov.au/ato/accrolelistresponse">
  <acc:RP>
    <acc:ContextIdentifiersTaxFileNumberIdentifier>01234567</acc:ContextIdentifiersTaxFileNumberIdentifier>
    <acc:ContextIdentifiersAustralianBusinessNumberIdentifier>01234567890</acc:ContextIdentifiersAustralianBusinessNumberIdentifier>
    <acc:ContextIdentifiersWithholdingPayerNumberIdentifier>01234567890</acc:ContextIdentifiersWithholdingPayerNumberIdentifier>
    <acc:ContextIdentifiersAustralianTaxationOfficeReferenceNumberIdentifier>string</acc:ContextIdentifiersAustralianTaxationOfficeReferenceNumberIdentifier>
    <acc:TaxAccountIdentifier>string</acc:TaxAccountIdentifier>
    <acc:TaxAccountSequenceNumber>200</acc:TaxAccountSequenceNumber>
    <acc:TaxAccountTypeCode>string</acc:TaxAccountTypeCode>
    <acc:TaxAccountTypeCategoryCode>string</acc:TaxAccountTypeCategoryCode>
    <acc:ReportForecastDate>2008-09-29</acc:ReportForecastDate>
    <acc:InteractionRecordCount>200</acc:InteractionRecordCount>
    <acc:RoleBalanceDetailsCollection>
      <!--0 to 250 repetitions:-->
      <acc:RoleBalanceDetails>
            <acc:TaxRoleTypeCode>string</acc:TaxRoleTypeCode>
            <acc:TaxRoleNameText>string</acc:TaxRoleNameText>
            <acc:TaxRoleStartDate>2014-09-19</acc:TaxRoleStartDate>
            <acc:TaxRoleEndDate>2006-08-20+10:00</acc:TaxRoleEndDate>
            <acc:TaxRoleRegistrationEffectiveDate>2009-05-16</acc:TaxRoleRegistrationEffectiveDate>
            <acc:LodgmentFrequencyCode>string</acc:LodgmentFrequencyCode>
            <acc:TaxAccountingTreatmentText>string</acc:TaxAccountingTreatmentText>
            <acc:TaxRoleBalanceAmount>1000.00</acc:TaxRoleBalanceAmount>
            <acc:TaxLiabilityDueAmount>1000.00</acc:TaxLiabilityDueAmount>
            <acc:TaxPenaltyInterestEstimatedDebitAmount>1000.00</acc:TaxPenaltyInterestEstimatedDebitAmount>
            <acc:PartyApprovedFinancialYearEndDate>--08-09+10:00</acc:PartyApprovedFinancialYearEndDate>
            <acc:TaxRoleNonReportingIndicator>false</acc:TaxRoleNonReportingIndicator>
      </acc:RoleBalanceDetails>
    </acc:RoleBalanceDetailsCollection>
    <acc:Pagination>
        <acc:InteractionRecordLimitCount>200</acc:InteractionRecordLimitCount>
        <acc:InteractionRecordListIndexNumber>200</acc:InteractionRecordListIndexNumber>
        <acc:InteractionAvailableRecordCount>200</acc:InteractionAvailableRecordCount>
    </acc:Pagination>
  </acc:RP>
</acc:ACCROLEListResponse>
```

## Fields
| Name | Description |
| --- | --- |
| [ContextIdentifiersTaxAgentNumberIdentifier](https://definitions.ausdx.io/definition/trc/de217) | An external identifier issued by the ATO on behalf of the Tax Agent's Board.  |
| [ContextIdentifiersAustralianBusinessNumberIdentifier](https://definitions.ausdx.io/definition/trc/de26) | A unique public identifier issued to all entities registered in the Australian Business Register (ABR), to be used in their dealings with government.|
| [IdentifiersTaxAgentNumberIdentifier](https://definitions.ausdx.io/definition/trc/de217) | An external identifier issued by the ATO on behalf of the Tax Agent's Board.  | 
| [ContextIdentifiersWithholdingPayerNumberIdentifier](https://definitions.ausdx.io/definition/trc/de29) | The Withholding Payer Number (WPN) is allocated to clients who have withholding obligations under Pay As You Go (PAYG) withholding but who do not have an Australian Business Number (ABN) |
| ReportForecastDate | The date that the report is forecast to |
| **The rest of the fields in the message would be here, but haven't been included in the prototype**  |
| ⋮ | ⋮ |

## Possible error codes
- **CMN.ATO.ACCROLE.000029**: Account identifier and Account sequence number are not provided.
- **CMN.ATO.ACCROLE.000030**: Invalid Record limit provided.
- **CMN.ATO.ACCROLE.000031**: Invalid Record start number provided.
- **CMN.ATO.GEN.MOREDATA**: More data exists for this request.
- **CMN.ATO.ACCROLE.UNKNOWN**: Unknown error occurred ({Code}).
- **CMN.ATO.ACCROLE.EM18055**: Either Account Identifier or Account sequence number must be supplied.
- **CMN.ATO.ACCROLE.EM92029**: No Client Accounts found for the supplied inputs.
- **CMN.ATO.ACCROLE.EM96489**: Role Balance Calculation Error.
- **CMN.ATO.ACCROLE.EM14245**: No financial details for this account.
- **CMN.ATO.ACCROLE.EM50059**: Record start number not provided.
- **CMN.ATO.ACCROLE.EM50007**: Record Limit not provided.
- **CMN.ATO.ACCROLE.EM60145**: GIC calculation error.
- **CMN.ATO.ACCROLE.EM14073**: No financial transactions found.
- **CMN.ATO.ACCROLE.EM96493**: GIC not applicable.
- **CMN.ATO.ACCROLE.EM96492**: GIC successfully calculated until current date.
- **CMN.ATO.ACCROLE.EM96491**: GIC successfully calculated for current date + one year.
- **CMN.ATO.ACCROLE.EM96490**: GIC successfully calculated.
- **CMN.ATO.ACCROLE.EM00032**: Requested account type not supported for this service.
- **CMN.ATO.ACCROLE.EM61047**: User not authorised to view the account.

subpages.title: Add
subpages.markdown:
Add a new activity statement role.

## Your request to us

```xml
<acc:ACCRoleSubmit xmlns:acc="http://www.sbr.gov.au/ato/accrolesubmit">
  <acc:INT>
    <acc:ContextIdentifiersAustralianBusinessNumberIdentifier>01234567890</acc:ContextIdentifiersAustralianBusinessNumberIdentifier>
    <acc:IdentifiersTaxAgentNumberIdentifier>01234556</acc:IdentifiersTaxAgentNumberIdentifier>
    <acc:TrueAndCorrect>
      <acc:DeclarationStatementAcceptedIndicator>false</acc:DeclarationStatementAcceptedIndicator>
      <acc:DeclarationSignatoryIdentifierText>string</acc:DeclarationSignatoryIdentifierText>
    </acc:TrueAndCorrect>
  </acc:INT>
  <acc:RP>
    <acc:ContextIdentifiersTaxFileNumberIdentifier>01234567</acc:ContextIdentifiersTaxFileNumberIdentifier>
    <acc:ContextIdentifiersAustralianBusinessNumberIdentifier>01234567890</acc:ContextIdentifiersAustralianBusinessNumberIdentifier>
    <acc:ContextIdentifiersWithholdingPayerNumberIdentifier>012345678</acc:ContextIdentifiersWithholdingPayerNumberIdentifier>
    <acc:ContextIdentifiersAustralianTaxationOfficeReferenceNumberIdentifier>012345678901</acc:ContextIdentifiersAustralianTaxationOfficeReferenceNumberIdentifier>
    <acc:TaxAccountIdentifier>012345678901</acc:TaxAccountIdentifier>
    <acc:TaxAccountSequenceNumber>200</acc:TaxAccountSequenceNumber>
    <acc:GST>
      <acc:TaxRoleRegistrationEffectiveDate>2007-10-26</acc:TaxRoleRegistrationEffectiveDate>
      <acc:GoodsAndServicesTaxTurnoverRangeCode>$150,000 - $1,999,999</acc:GoodsAndServicesTaxTurnoverRangeCode>
      <acc:LodgmentFrequencyCode>Monthly</acc:LodgmentFrequencyCode>
      <acc:AccountingPoliciesCashAccountingMethodUsedIndicator>true</acc:AccountingPoliciesCashAccountingMethodUsedIndicator>
      <acc:GoodsAndServicesTaxLegislativeRegistrationIndicator>false</acc:GoodsAndServicesTaxLegislativeRegistrationIndicator>
      <acc:GoodsAndServicesTaxVoluntaryRegistrationIndicator>false</acc:GoodsAndServicesTaxVoluntaryRegistrationIndicator>
      <acc:GoodsAndServicesTaxImportIndicator>false</acc:GoodsAndServicesTaxImportIndicator>
    </acc:GST>
    <acc:FTC>
      <acc:TaxRoleRegistrationEffectiveDate>2013-05-22+10:00</acc:TaxRoleRegistrationEffectiveDate>
      <acc:FuelTaxFuelTypeDieselIndicator>true</acc:FuelTaxFuelTypeDieselIndicator>
      <acc:FuelTaxFuelTypePetrolIndicator>false</acc:FuelTaxFuelTypePetrolIndicator>
      <acc:FuelTaxFuelTypeOtherIndicator>false</acc:FuelTaxFuelTypeOtherIndicator>
      <acc:FuelTaxHeavyVehicleIndicator>false</acc:FuelTaxHeavyVehicleIndicator>
    </acc:FTC>
    <acc:LCT>
      <acc:TaxRoleRegistrationEffectiveDate>2016-01-02</acc:TaxRoleRegistrationEffectiveDate>
      <acc:LuxuryCarTaxManufactureIndicator>true</acc:LuxuryCarTaxManufactureIndicator>
      <acc:LuxuryCarTaxWholesaleIndicator>false</acc:LuxuryCarTaxWholesaleIndicator>
      <acc:LuxuryCarTaxRetailIndicator>true</acc:LuxuryCarTaxRetailIndicator>
      <acc:LuxuryCarTaxImportIndicator>true</acc:LuxuryCarTaxImportIndicator>
      <acc:LuxuryCarTaxManufacturingPercent>100</acc:LuxuryCarTaxManufacturingPercent>
      <acc:LuxuryCarTaxWholesalePercent>100</acc:LuxuryCarTaxWholesalePercent>
      <acc:LuxuryCarTaxImportingPercent>100</acc:LuxuryCarTaxImportingPercent>
      <acc:LuxuryCarTaxRetailingPercent>10</acc:LuxuryCarTaxRetailingPercent>
      <acc:LuxuryCarTaxLiabilityRangeCode>More than $5 million</acc:LuxuryCarTaxLiabilityRangeCode>
      <acc:LuxuryCarTaxActivityStatementRegistrationIndicator>true</acc:LuxuryCarTaxActivityStatementRegistrationIndicator>
    </acc:LCT>
    <acc:WET>
      <acc:TaxRoleRegistrationEffectiveDate>2013-06-18</acc:TaxRoleRegistrationEffectiveDate>
      <acc:WineEqualisationTaxManufacturingIndicator>false</acc:WineEqualisationTaxManufacturingIndicator>
      <acc:WineEqualisationTaxWholesaleIndicator>false</acc:WineEqualisationTaxWholesaleIndicator>
      <acc:WineEqualisationTaxImportingIndicator>false</acc:WineEqualisationTaxImportingIndicator>
      <acc:WineEqualisationTaxExportingIndicator>false</acc:WineEqualisationTaxExportingIndicator>
      <acc:WineEqualisationTaxIndirectMarketingRetailerIndicator>true</acc:WineEqualisationTaxIndirectMarketingRetailerIndicator>
      <acc:WineEqualisationTaxWinePercent>100</acc:WineEqualisationTaxWinePercent>
      <acc:WineEqualisationTaxBeerPercent>100</acc:WineEqualisationTaxBeerPercent>
      <acc:WineEqualisationTaxSpiritPercent>100</acc:WineEqualisationTaxSpiritPercent>
      <acc:WineEqualisationTaxOtherPercent>100</acc:WineEqualisationTaxOtherPercent>
    </acc:WET>
    <acc:PAYGW>
      <acc:TaxRoleRegistrationEffectiveDate>2015-08-24</acc:TaxRoleRegistrationEffectiveDate>
      <acc:IncomeTaxPayAsYouGoWithholdingEstimatedTaxWithheldAmount>100</acc:IncomeTaxPayAsYouGoWithholdingEstimatedTaxWithheldAmount>
      <acc:LabourStatisticsEmployeesCount>200</acc:LabourStatisticsEmployeesCount>
      <acc:LodgmentFrequencyCode>Quarterly</acc:LodgmentFrequencyCode>
      <acc:EmployerConditionsWorkingHolidayMakerIndicator>true</acc:EmployerConditionsWorkingHolidayMakerIndicator>
      <acc:IncomeTaxPayAsYouGoWithholdingPaymentSummaryProvisionMethodCode>Both</acc:IncomeTaxPayAsYouGoWithholdingPaymentSummaryProvisionMethodCode>
      <acc:IncomeTaxPayAsYouGoWithholdingInvestmentBodyIndicator>false</acc:IncomeTaxPayAsYouGoWithholdingInvestmentBodyIndicator>
      <acc:IncomeTaxPayAsYouGoWithholdingReportingMethodCode>Both</acc:IncomeTaxPayAsYouGoWithholdingReportingMethodCode>
      <acc:OrganisationDetailsOrganisationIndustryGroupCode>string</acc:OrganisationDetailsOrganisationIndustryGroupCode>
      <acc:OrganisationDetailsMainIncomeActivityDescription>string</acc:OrganisationDetailsMainIncomeActivityDescription>
      <acc:OrganisationDetailsMainEmploymentActivityDescription>string</acc:OrganisationDetailsMainEmploymentActivityDescription>
    </acc:PAYGW>
    <acc:PAYGI>
      <acc:IncomeTaxTaxableNetGrossDomesticProductAdjustedAmount>1000.00</acc:IncomeTaxTaxableNetGrossDomesticProductAdjustedAmount>
    </acc:PAYGI>
    <acc:TrueAndCorrect>
      <acc:DeclarationStatementAcceptedIndicator>false</acc:DeclarationStatementAcceptedIndicator>
      <acc:DeclarationSignatoryIdentifierText>string</acc:DeclarationSignatoryIdentifierText>
    </acc:TrueAndCorrect>
  </acc:RP>
</acc:ACCRoleSubmit>
```

## Our response

```xml
<acc:ACCRoleSubmitResponse xmlns:acc="http://www.sbr.gov.au/ato/accrolesubmitresponse">
  <acc:RP>
    <acc:ContextIdentifiersTaxFileNumberIdentifier>stringstr</acc:ContextIdentifiersTaxFileNumberIdentifier>
    <acc:ContextIdentifiersAustralianBusinessNumberIdentifier>string</acc:ContextIdentifiersAustralianBusinessNumberIdentifier>
    <acc:ContextIdentifiersWithholdingPayerNumberIdentifier>string</acc:ContextIdentifiersWithholdingPayerNumberIdentifier>
    <acc:ContextIdentifiersAustralianTaxationOfficeReferenceNumberIdentifier>string</acc:ContextIdentifiersAustralianTaxationOfficeReferenceNumberIdentifier>
    <acc:TaxAccountIdentifier>string</acc:TaxAccountIdentifier>
    <acc:TaxAccountSequenceNumber>200</acc:TaxAccountSequenceNumber>
    <acc:GST>
      <acc:TaxRoleStartDate>2008-09-29</acc:TaxRoleStartDate>
      <acc:TaxRoleRegistrationEffectiveDate>2014-09-19</acc:TaxRoleRegistrationEffectiveDate>
      <acc:TaxRoleNonReportingIndicator>true</acc:TaxRoleNonReportingIndicator>

      <acc:LodgmentFrequencyCode>HalfYearly</acc:LodgmentFrequencyCode>

    </acc:GST>
    <acc:FTC>

      <acc:FuelTaxFuelTypeOtherIndicator>false</acc:FuelTaxFuelTypeOtherIndicator>
      <acc:FuelTaxHeavyVehicleIndicator>true</acc:FuelTaxHeavyVehicleIndicator>
    </acc:FTC>
    <acc:LCT>
      <acc:TaxRoleStartDate>2014-10-27</acc:TaxRoleStartDate>
      <acc:TaxRoleRegistrationEffectiveDate>2013-06-18</acc:TaxRoleRegistrationEffectiveDate>
      <acc:LodgmentFrequencyCode>HalfYearly</acc:LodgmentFrequencyCode>
      <acc:LuxuryCarTaxManufactureIndicator>false</acc:LuxuryCarTaxManufactureIndicator>

      <acc:LuxuryCarTaxRetailIndicator>false</acc:LuxuryCarTaxRetailIndicator>
      <acc:LuxuryCarTaxImportIndicator>true</acc:LuxuryCarTaxImportIndicator>
      <acc:LuxuryCarTaxManufacturingPercent>1000.00</acc:LuxuryCarTaxManufacturingPercent>
      <acc:LuxuryCarTaxWholesalePercent>1000.00</acc:LuxuryCarTaxWholesalePercent>
      <acc:LuxuryCarTaxImportingPercent>1000.00</acc:LuxuryCarTaxImportingPercent>
      <acc:LuxuryCarTaxRetailingPercent>1000.00</acc:LuxuryCarTaxRetailingPercent>
      <acc:LuxuryCarTaxLiabilityRangeCode>string</acc:LuxuryCarTaxLiabilityRangeCode>
      <acc:LuxuryCarTaxActivityStatementRegistrationIndicator>true</acc:LuxuryCarTaxActivityStatementRegistrationIndicator>
    </acc:LCT>
    <acc:WET>
      <acc:TaxRoleStartDate>2009-11-03+11:00</acc:TaxRoleStartDate>
      <acc:TaxRoleRegistrationEffectiveDate>2014-06-28+10:00</acc:TaxRoleRegistrationEffectiveDate>
      <acc:LodgmentFrequencyCode>Quarterly</acc:LodgmentFrequencyCode>

      <acc:WineEqualisationTaxWholesaleIndicator>true</acc:WineEqualisationTaxWholesaleIndicator>

  </acc:RP>
</acc:ACCRoleSubmitResponse>
```

## Fields
| Name | Description |
| --- | --- |
| [ContextIdentifiersAustralianBusinessNumberIdentifier](https://definitions.ausdx.io/definition/trc/de26) | A unique public identifier issued to all entities registered in the Australian Business Register (ABR), to be used in their dealings with government.|
| [IdentifiersTaxAgentNumberIdentifier](https://definitions.ausdx.io/definition/trc/de217) | An external identifier issued by the ATO on behalf of the Tax Agent's Board. |
 | [DeclarationStatementAcceptedIndicator](https://definitions.ausdx.io/definition/trc/de229) | Indicates that the terms stated in the Declaration Text have been accepted or declined. | 
| [DeclarationSignatoryIdentifierText](https://definitions.ausdx.io/definition/trc/de3147) | 	Identifier defined and used by the ABR device credential holder to identify a user. | 
| [ContextIdentifiersTaxFileNumberIdentifier](https://definitions.ausdx.io/definition/trc/de27) | A unique number issued by the Tax Office to individuals and organisations to identify their tax records |
| [ContextIdentifiersWithholdingPayerNumberIdentifier](https://definitions.ausdx.io/definition/trc/de29) | The Withholding Payer Number (WPN) is allocated to clients who have withholding obligations under Pay As You Go (PAYG) withholding but who do not have an Australian Business Number (ABN) |
| ContextIdentifiersAustralianTaxationOfficeReferenceNumberIdentifier | This is a unique identifier issued by the Australian Taxation Office (ATO) to entities who may not have a Tax File Number (TFN), or for entities interacting with the Tax Office in roles other than their Income Tax who may not have an Australian Business Number (ABN) | 
| **The rest of the fields in the message would be here, but haven't been included in the prototype**  |
| ⋮ | ⋮ |

## Possible error codes
- **CMN.ATO.ACCROLE.EM60230**: User not authorised.
- **CMN.ATO.ACCROLE.EM11064**: Account does not exist for the client.
- **CMN.ATO.ACCROLE.EM40244**: Group relationships exist.
- **CMN.ATO.ACCROLE.EM60433**: An accounting treatment exists.
- **CMN.ATO.ACCROLE.EM11002**: A role already exists.
- **CMN.ATO.ACCROLE.EM60270**: Invalid GST Role start date provided.
- **CMN.ATO.ACCROLE.EM92027**: Activity statement exists for the requested period.
- **CMN.ATO.ACCROLE.EM61125**: No active income tax role found.
- **CMN.ATO.ACCROLE.EM40568**: An active TFN was not found.
- **CMN.ATO.ACCROLE.EM40274**: Client status is deceased.
- **CMN.ATO.ACCROLE.EM61293**: Income Tax return record not found.
- **CMN.ATO.ACCROLE.EM91991**: Client is not required to lodge an Income Tax return
- **CMN.ATO.ACCROLE.EM48116**: Activity statement will be generated for prior periods.
- **CMN.ATO.ACCROLE.EM61357**: Client is not eligible for PAYGI.
- **CMN.ATO.ACCROLE.EM99014**: Client is not eligible for PAYGI.
- **CMN.ATO.ACCROLE.EM96475**: An active GST role was not found.
- **CMN.ATO.ACCROLE.EM40218**: PAYGW role was added where no ABN is present.
- **CMN.ATO.ACCROLE.EM90001**: TFN not provided.
- **CMN.ATO.ACCROLE.EM90320**: Main business activity not provided.
- **CMN.ATO.ACCROLE.EM96420**: Multiple accounts found.
- **CMN.ATO.ACCROLE.EM96443**: An active GST role exists for the entity.
- **CMN.ATO.ACCROLE.EM96444**: An active GST role exists for the entity.
